text: Serum samples were obtained from all 34 participants at an average of 7 . 3 months ( range : 6 . 7 - 8 . 1 months ) after exposure . On ELISA , there were 33 ( 97 . 1 % ) negative results and one borderline result . The results of six samples , including one with borderline ELISA results , were negative in the IIFT and PRNT .
